misc: Struggles with his gender identity, occasionally participating in events under his female alter-ego, "Eva".
biography: Marcus is a highly accomplished golfer who hails from Kurk Golf.  He has consistently demonstrated skill and dedication throughout his career, making a name for himself in the competitive world of professional golf.  His participation in the prestigious Hector Trophée since 2022 showcases his commitment to excellence and his passion for the game.

Known for his powerful drives and strategic short game, Marcus is a formidable opponent on the course.  While he’s yet to secure a victory in the Hector Trophée, his consistent appearances in the tournament are a testament to his resilience and determination.  He has consistently placed highly throughout his appearances and is considered one of the most promising players in the field.

Off the course, Marcus is known for his complex and nuanced journey.  While he publicly identifies as male and competes primarily under that identity, he occasionally participates in events under his female alter ego, Eva, showcasing an openness and self-awareness which extends to all facets of his life.  This unique perspective only adds to the allure of this rising star in the sport.
